titleStmt.title: The friendly enquirer's doubts and objections answered concerning the light within, the word of God, the church of Christ, gospel ministers, ordinances in general and in particular, water baptism, and the Lord's supper : together with a brief testimony against oaths and swearing / first intended and written for the satisfaction of some particular acquaintance and now published for more general service by James Jackson.
titleStmt.author: Jackson, James, fl. 1674-1708.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and sold by T. Sowle ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
